alert.note: Alert for Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Upson, southern Talbot and northwestern Taylor Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Box Springs to Carsonville, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Talbotton, Junction City, Geneva, Howard, Juniper, Baldwinville, Salem, Prattsburg, Carsonville, Wesley Church and Po Biddy Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central and west central Georgia.
